svg.title: Goosebumps Storyline Visualization
svg.desc: A visualization of possible story paths in Give Yourself Goosebumps: Trapped in Bat Wing Hall. Created using Neo4j.

g.text: keep trying to help ghost scare the kids
scrap the scare plan and try something different
decide to ignore Debbie's offer and continue hunting
decide Debbie is telling the truth
try to squeeze broom into elevator without snapping any straws
break a straw off the broom to force it through entrance
decide to eavesdrop on Nick, Connor, and Debbie
decide to follow mummy instead of eavesdrop on monsters
ignore the couple and try to find your way by yourself
stay away from closet door, head back towards dining room instead
you're wearing a sweatshirt/sweater, so turn right
you're not wearing a sweatshirt/sweater, so turn left
decide to stay on the main floor
decline King's offer, decide to leave the palace
accept King's offer to stay with him
crawl into the crypt through the hole on top
stay with the monster and hope it eventually helps you get back
make a run for the crypt door you see
try to get them to move Horror Club to a new place
try to convince them Bat Wing Hall is haunted
run towards some tall grass to hide
hide from King in mummy case
take a piece of bandage from mummy's case
tear a strip of bandage off sleeping mummy
drop to the ground, following Nick's instructions
ignore Nick's instructions and head for the door
go back to sleep and wait until next morning
choose to leave the witch in the box and steal her broom
show your friends tonight at Bat Wing Hall
decide it's all a joke; the kids aren't actually monsters
follow the sign labeled "to the crypt"
